info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 24 at 10:54PM PDT until August 25 at 12:15AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM PDT THURSDAY FOR SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 1054 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated rain was become light to moderate over the area from Needles to Lake Havasu in southeast San Bernardino County. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain were estimated to have fallen over the area prior to 1030 PM PDT. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Highway 95 south of Needles, Havasu Lake Road FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
